duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist Firm Administrator in generating accurate monthly billing for attorney review and prepare invoices as directed.
Manage entry of client advances and expenses to allow for prompt billing and collection.
Assist Firm Administrator in entering daily check and wire payments in TABS3.
Assist Firm Administrator in submitting daily check deposits with bank.
Research and respond to billing inquiries.
Draft and send out engagement letters as requested by attorneys.
Save documents in appropriate locations within the firm’s document management system, ensuring that they are appropriately named according to firm naming conventions.

education_certification.credential: College degree preferred. 0- 1 year of accounting or other relevant experience. Previous law firm billing experience a plus.
